website_summaries.verdict: A frameless bathroom mirror that brings a hint of sophistication to a bathroom's decor.
pros: Classic rectangular mirror blends style and function
Includes silver backing that helps reduce corrosion
High-end glass construction eliminates reflection distortion
Sold with loop-style hangers that are pre-installed into the back of the mirror for fast, seamless installation
cons: Mirror tends to be fragile in contrast to similar options

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to create my vanity space and it’s perfect. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. Wonderful value. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is exactly as described! It arrived on time, well packaged and without damage. It comes complete with a 1/8"+ board mounted to the back with hooks to hang either vertically or horizontally already mounted on the board. Wall hardware is also included. The mirror hangs like a picture would on a wall. I like this feature. Should I want to repaint the wall, I can easily remove and then replace the mirror. The top of the mirror does tilt slightly away from the walI (mirror is not parallel to the wall), but this does not seem to cause any reflection distortion. I really like that the mirror is made in the USA and from a family-run company.
customer_reviews.author: voila viola

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and arrived safe and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 7 mirrors and frankly with a little skepticism in that these were not small mirrors and questioned whether these could be safely shipped with the less-than-gentle handling of the shipper. I was thoroughly impressed with the very thoughtful packaging design. All arrived each in their own box safe and sound. The mirrors are beautiful and of great quality! I mounted them today (4 different bathrooms) and I was equally impressed with the consistent accuracy of hook placement. The only way that these mirrors would not hang plumb/level would be the result of a bum level which, fortunately, mine was not. Love the product !! Thank you Better Bevel!
customer_reviews.author: tipsters

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I am a manager at a resort and we were looking to replace mirrors in some of our rooms over the sink. These mirrors exceeded my expectations in quality and ease of installation. I would without hesitation order from The Better Bevel again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Shore Inn

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, perfect customer service
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is well made and comes with mounting hooks for both horizontal and vertical hanging. We opted for mirror clips and they fit the bevel with no problem. The mirror is flawless and edges perfectly polished. Customer service from the Better Bevel company is excellent, a damaged mirror is replaced immediately. I would not hesitate ordering another and probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality mirror, it doesn't make you wavy or thinner or fatter than you actually are. It comes with screws etc needed to hang it, and it was easy to do. I'm very happy with it, and bought another - I use them for exercise and yoga. The only thing I'd wish different is that the hooks on the back were a little longer, it's a bit tricky to mount on the screws because the back has to go so close to the wall before the hooks catch on the screws, and it's a bit hard to maneuver. But once it's on, it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two mirrors to fit into custom made hardwood frames I finished over the weekend for a bathroom remodel. Mirrors arrived today having shipped promptly, was very well packaged with no damage. Mirrors look great, only issue is the dimensions. My 22.5” by 34.5” mirrors are both an eighth inch wider and taller than the stated dimensions. This does not fit into the frames and will require re-routing the inset. Unclear why the mirror dimensions are not exact as was the case with a third (larger) mirror ordered from a different company? Dimensions would be a non-issue if I were leaving these unframed, but why not give me exact dimensions on a templated product?
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fragile mirror. We were being very careful, but it chipped twice as we were installing it. Additionally, the hangers provided on the back of the mirror could not be positioned so as to enable attaching them to the picture hangers. I ended up attaching picture wire to the hangers on the back of the mirror to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: LindaK

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror! Sturdy and cute. I was able to install it by myself and I am NOT a handy person. You will need a drill however. Great value for your money and great as a vanity mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror value for the master bath remodeling
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, this pair of mirrors represent two of the best acquisitions for our bathroom makeover (see pictures on either side of the tower). The beveled edge, the packaging and texture and mounting clips & hardware nicely complement the new vanities and counter top . They are a bit heavy and a measuring tape, pencil, a drill for the anchors plus an extra pair of hands are essential. Besides, the wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy mirror
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are very chic. These were the perfect solution for our bathroom.We replaced a 36 by 60 inch mirror original to our 1968 master bath. with these two and it updated the look by 39 years. The beveled glass is classic and rich. I'll probably use another set when we redo the guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: penny's from heaven

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Quality - Silver Backing Comes Off
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mirror for only a month, and already its edges are turning black, making it look very cheap, old, and janky. I received it at the beginning of December, it sat indoors and packaged for a week, and then it went straight from its packaging onto the wall, and at the end of December I already noticed the spots that were originally not there. (They're even more noticeable in person than in my pictures.) It's a pretty mirror, but it seems that it's very poorly made if the backing hasn't survived a couple of weeks of hanging on a wall, and that's telling me it'll only look even worse very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Rich looking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very well packaged with contents in perfect condition. All mounting hardware were included. Fairly easy to hang, but we are very inexperienced so it took some time. Ran a wire between D rings and hung from the two included anchors spaced a few inches apart. Noticed a very tiny chip in one of the corners, that we very well may have caused. No big deal. Otherwise, these mirrors are beautiful. The bevel is perfect. Highly recommend. When I order mirrors in the future, I’ll get them from better bevel.
customer_reviews.author: gingerky

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not meant to be hung on a wall
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Customer Service immediately reached out and offered to refund me for this purchase. I appreciate that. This mirror lasted less than a year before separating from the backing, falling, and crashing. We came home to find shattered glass all over the bathroom and a chipped sink. Purchased in November 2017, received it in December, hung in February 2018, dashed itself to smithereens in June of 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Singer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror, but the hangers make it really hard to install
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was just what I wanted. It's beautiful and sturdy. As I wanted it to hang higher than I could manage (a bit vertically challenged), I hired my handyman to hang it. It took him over an hour because the D-rings that were on the back of the mirror were installed in from the outside edge much too far. He's got long fingers, but they didn't come close to being able to reach the rings. So It was a challenge getting both of the rings on their hooks at the same time. We installed another mirror that we already owned the same day, and the rings were close to the edge and that went up in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to clean, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mirrors for my bathroom renovation to fit over a 72in vanity. I've had them up for about a month. They lay flat against the wall, they look very stylish with the bevels, and they have been easy to clean so far. My contractors had no problem installing them. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: First off the mirrors were perfect for our renovation. I would like to commend Better Bevel for outstanding customer service. We ordered two mirrors and one was damaged in route and replaced. The replacement was received but not taken out of the box for almost a month going through the renovations. When it was taken out there was a chip out of one of the corners. I contacted the seller and without any hassle a new one arrived just days later. Can't thank them enough for such service.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, heavy, well made The D hooks on the back are too small. when they are perpendicular to the back, they only protrude about 1/2 inch from the back. Near impossible to get them to hook over the molly without them folding flush to the back. Larger D hooks would allow you to get your hand between mirror and wall to hook them and then still fold flush when hanging from the molly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Beveled mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, packing and shipping seemed to be excellent. But as many have complained, installation isn't easy. I put a little tape on the hooks to make them stand out about 45 degrees to try to grab the screw heads. But it was too heavy and I had to get wife to help - she held one side while I fished for the screw on the other. Once installed they look great.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Decent and easy to hang mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the perfect size for the teenagers “Hollywood” lights vanity mirror, the hooks on the back make it easy to hang in any direction. Its a good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vienn M. Longmire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in the kids bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a small beveled mirror but didn't want to spend big bucks on it at the local glass store. This one is perfect. It hung easily and gets the job done and looks great too. It is almost flush to the wall, just hangs a little away from it (less than half an inch). If we need another mirror, I would get this againn.
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Just purchased my third one of these, this particular one in their largest size (the other two were for smaller bathrooms). As was the case with the other two mirrors I purchased previously from The Better Bevel, it arrived well-packaged and right on time. Great attention to detail in the manufacture and shipping of the mirror. Easy to hang with sturdy (but not obtrusive) backing and sturdy hanging metal loops pre-attached. I would buy another one from them in a heartbeat if needed! All three mirrors look beautiful in my bathrooms. Tip: If hanging on drywall where no studs are available consider using Gorilla hooks...
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors were exactly what we needed. The quality is excellent. The packaging was excellent and the mirrors arrived in perfect condition. We wanted something that added to our clean lines and updated look. I would recommend this company to everyone. I searched stores and the internet for the best price for my specific dimensions. This company is exactly what was needed. Quality, pricing and excellence.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was extremely well packaged, no room for damage. The mirror itself was exactly as advertised. Bevel mirror. It had no scratches or bubbles. I haven’t put it up yet so not sure how easy that is (still need to paint wall.) definitely as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky duck

customer_reviews.title: difficult to hang properly
customer_reviews.text: I am competent with home handyman projects. This mirror is difficult (impossible?) to hang correctly with the hardware that comes with it, except if you don't care whether your mirror is level or not. I had to hang it with hooks and wire that I had in my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adey

customer_reviews.title: My bathroom instantly looked better.
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into my house, the bathroom mirror was much too big for the space and it had dark spots. I hesitated to change it, but as soon as this new mirror was on the wall, the bathroom looked exponentially better. Best of all, I was able to donate the old mirror to a thrift shop. This mirror is designed to be used in a damp area so I do not expect it to develop dark spots.
customer_reviews.author: chairofbowlies

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror overall
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror overall. The mounting apparatus on the back is nice, but due to the weight of the mirror we decided to buy something else to mount on a wall stud. One complaint - around one edge of the mirror the reflective backing doesn't go all the way to the edge. My daughter decided to keep it since she will be using this as a vanity mirror and plans to use light strips around the edge. The missing backing won't be visible.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible hanging system!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality mirror, but your hanging system of D-Rings stink especially over top of an existing vanity!! Should be a two piece cleat system which is a typical mounting system for good mirrors! My misery was times two, purchased two of these mirrors trying to get D-Ring to hook on screw head with a 40" wide by 30" high mirror in a 48" wide opening over top of an existing 48" vanity with faucets, backsplash, light fixture above with no side access, front only! Someone has to think about install!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about ordering a mirror online but the packaging was great! The mirror arrived unscathed and in perfect condition. I like the beveling around the mirror; it gives a nice, high-end look. It is a little thinner than my old mirror that broke, but the thickness is unnoticeable once the mirror is hung. I did add a layer of security to the mounting system by reinstalling the old wall brackets to the bottom mirror. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.text: After looking at dozens of mirror options we found the Better Bevel mirror to be ideal for our new master bath renovation. The size and quality for the reasonable price was the deciding factor, and now that we’ve received them so quickly with no damage, it’s clear we made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is very nice quality and great looking. Packaging was heavy duty and arrived unscathed. Coupled with easy installation and fast delivery, it was an exceptional buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Modern Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror shipped in a very secure box and when it was taken out, looked beautiful. No issues with cracks or damage. It was a little difficult to hang due to the hardware it has attached and how flat it lays, but after a few minutes, we were able to get it. The mirror is beautiful and gives me the modern look I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is easy to hang. It comes with the hangers attached in the back and with the choice of vertical or horizontal directions and it also has little buffer pads attached. The bevel is nicely wide and really makes the mirror beautiful. So glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: The mirrors arrived with no problems. They were packaged very well and all components were included. The instructions for hanging were very easy to follow. The hardest part was attaching the mirror hanger to the screw. Having an extra pair of hands would have helped. I managed to do it on my own and am very proud of my accomplishment since I am a 69yr. old female. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kraley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a really high quality mirror, easy to install and looks great! Having recently remodeled a bathroom, I have learned a lot of items are not adequately packaged and get damaged in the shipping process. Not this item, it was well protected
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived well packaged. The mirror it self is even prettier then picture, and comes ready to hang. I have not hung mine as yet, as I will need someone to help putting it up due to the weight.
customer_reviews.author: sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Invest in this quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: It took two tries to get one here to my house because the first one broke in transit. It was replaced with no hassle. I bought a cheap $25 mirror in the interim and the difference between the two is totally worth paying $70. The cheap mirror was mounted with plastic clips that you could see. This mirror just floats on the wall. The difference between eighth of an inch and quarter of an inch thickness is noticeable when it comes to distortion in the reflection. Very pleased with this purchase. This is the one time you want to invest in quality. You’re going to be staring at your reflection for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wall mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This lovely mirror hangs in my new bathroom. It is a sleek, modern style with good quality. The installation was easy and directions simple. The mirror came carefully packaged. I will consider another purchase from this vendor. You will be happy to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy duty, but took some time to figure out how to install it on my bathroom door, which has depressed panels which (of course) align with the location of the D-hooks. I used "C.R. LAURENCE MC00BN CRL Brushed Nickel 5/8" Wide Beveled Mirror Clip Set" and highly recommend them if you're in a similar jam.
customer_reviews.author: Contrary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Clean simple mirror
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice simple mirror with a beveled edge. Love the French cleat mounting, could not be easier to use. The only reason i went 4 stars instead of 5 is base on how thin the mirror is. That might be a good thing, but it will be interesting to see how it hold up over time. Otherwise, we're very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian-B

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: Style comes from the quality of this mirror. Note, the mirror arrived broken. I sent it back and received a replacement immediately. Highly recommend the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Kolomna

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We renovated our 3 bathrooms and removed the sheet mirrors that were glued to the wall. The old mirrors had started to blacken around the edges so we wanted a better quality mirror that we could hang. These mirrors have a very clean look and the single bevel dresses it up. They were easy to hang and all of the hanging material was included. Well packaged to prevent damage in transit. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Costin

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my mirror. It works with any bathroom style, super sleek and modern. It was very difficult to hang though.... I almost returned it but decided to give it another try and it worked!
customer_reviews.author: valentina a.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the way the mirror was shipped. It was extremely well-packaged. The back hangers are very sturdy and I appreciated the included gel bumpers to keep the bottom edges of the mirror from smacking the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe packing problems?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my bathroom. One arrived with a massive crack, so I returned it and ordered another. That arrived with a chip in the corner. I was having workers do the installation, and didn't want to hold them up, which would have cost me time and money, so I used it, but I'm not particularly happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Gold

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mirrors for my master bath Reno. Could not be happier. They arrived perfect and were packed very securely. Do not hesitate to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Belcanto

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was great and it arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror in quick fashion. The packaging was great and it arrived in perfect condition. I needed a very specific sized mirror for my bathroom. It fit perfectly, was easy to hang by myself, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K. Harnett

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this brand. High quality mirror, heavy and looks expensive. Have two from this brand now and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hanging method is hangers on the back of the frame
customer_reviews.text: I rated this 5 stars because once installed, they look really great. They're simple and classy. Quality seems good, but I have only had them for a few days. My contractor said the hanging mechanism is like a picture frame, so you have those hangers on the back and you hang them on screws in the wall. So far, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia J. Eanes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy all around
customer_reviews.text: Well made. 1/3 the price from the price from the local glass shop and they would not even have been built with the backing and hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Stubbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mirror for our new bathroom. This beveled mirror was the perfect size so I bought it. When it arrived I was thrilled with the ease of installation. It fits in the space perfectly and finishes off the room. If I need any other mirrors I will certainly check Better Bevel.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: These are quality mirrors and I LOVE the fact that they include very good installation brackets on the backs, making installation a real breeze, and can be hung vertically or horizontally. No visible clips. It's fool proof as long as you know how to use a level and screwdriver to fasten the female bracket to the wall, then slide the male bracket (which is fixed to the back of the mirror), into the female bracket and you have a perfect installation. I've only seen this type of fastener used on Fine Art paintings. I wish hanging EVERYTHING was this easy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror - clear image & constructed extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our bathroom after a remodel & it looks excellent in the space. It is very well constructed - with a clear refection - no imperfection in the glass or mirroring...excellent buy & beautiful mirror for any space ..
customer_reviews.author: RgmB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror but the mounting hooks on the back were useless to me.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hooks on the back of the mirror seemed like a good idea before I bought the mirror: there would be no mounting brackets showing. However, I finally gave up trying to get the hooks to latch onto the mounting screws anchored in the wall. (Yes, my measurements were correct). I went out and bought standard spring loaded mirror mounting brackets. They worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,  Aesthetically nice. Very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality and ease of installation. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first this mirror arriving undamaged. But it was packed very well and is worthy of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Lack of the accuracy on the mirror
customer_reviews.text: We are remodelling our powder bathroom ourselves and ordered mirror 20 by 28. After watching installation video my husband calculated the distance and levelled he hung up the mirror and we found out the mirror looked slightly off. We checked the mirror n found out the back part that suppose to hook is glued off a little. We are struggling over an hour and has to use other our own anchor and nail. I am so disappointed. You should indicate on the web page “ check the back part if its leveled before u install it”
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror, hard to install
customer_reviews.text: We really loved the mirror. It looks great and is very well made. One criticism is that we found it very hard to hang because the hooks on the back are very loose and don't angle out to easily be dropped onto the screws. That is the only reason, I give it 4 and not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AZguy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is EXACTLY what I was looking for to hang above my vanity and I’m so glad I purchased! I put stick in lights around it to frame it and I could not be happier with this purchase. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good prices for good quality mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Very good product all around we buy mirrors for our customers when we do bath remodels .... will be buying from them again😉
customer_reviews.author: zuneytunes

customer_reviews.title: Great looking for bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy mirror One of the d rings on the back side of our mirror was bent and so it is not level while hanging I decided to purchase the larger size mirror in oval shape and return this rectangular mirror For reference : 20 x 30 mirror hung vertically 11” between the D Rings
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mirrors to hang over double vanities in our master bathroom. The mirror received good reviews from other purchasers and when I received my order, I understood why. The quality is impressive especially for the price. We haven’t hung the mirrors yet as we are still in the construction phase of our bathroom. I will update after they are hung. Based on how they were packaged for shipping, the overall quality of the item and the fact that they are made in the USA make this a great purchase! Don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Not a $150 mirror, but for the cost...great. Super easy to install. I messed up leveling the included "bracket." (It was simple but I just wasn't careful.) A folded paper shim fixed that problem. I really like the beveled edges and simple lines. If I ever need another bathroom mirror, I'm going to return to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Positive Reflection of Mirror purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hardware for hanging included soft adhesive pads to keep base of mirror hanging. Excellent instruction. Very easy to install. Looks great in our remodeled baths
customer_reviews.author: Max Martz

customer_reviews.title: Here's Looking at You!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was the final piece for our bathroom remodel! Fit just right and my husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Pistor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Originally disappointed that I only received one of two mirrors ordered. Apparently FedEx damaged one mirror but nobody notified me of the problem. I gave a disappointed review and after a few days seller notified me that they were sorry and sent me a replacement for the damaged mirror. Installation was easy and both mirrors really look nice.
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! The mirror is good quality and arrived in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The mirror is good quality and arrived in perfect condition. It came with the hanging hardware already attached on the back so we hung it up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for the price. I never thought of ordering a mirror from amazon. It arrived with no scratches or chips. The only difficult thing about hanging the mirror is trying to line up the back of the mirror with the plate piece that is screwed into the wall. I would recommend this mirror for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like!!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived on the scheduled day, totally intact and ready to install. Installation was a breeze. Two screws, a drill, and a level was all it took. I had it mounted in about 15 minutes. Beautiful mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful! I set it up as my vanity mirror and I could not be more happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for great price
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 for our bathroom remodel and they look awesome! 1 came chipped on corner but I contacted amazon and they sent me a new one!
customer_reviews.author: tori pierce

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Should have been on a cord. Was alittle hard to install definitely need two people.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Giacomelli

customer_reviews.title: Love our mirror
customer_reviews.text: This lovely mirror was the final part of our bathroom renovation. It arrived well-packed and had friendly, helpful instructions. Thank you for a beautiful product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, simple and clean look over a sink in a small guest bathroom. Wasn't sure about the "Z" hang feature, but thankfully it was easy and the mirror is flush to the wall. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Peel

customer_reviews.title: Good Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy mirror without being too heavy to mount on the wall. It was very well packaged and arrived without any cracks, nicks or scratches. It was the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: ROJO

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! Perfect size too. I can actually see my face clearly with this mirror. It’s big enough to cover your face and your body to your hips. Easy to install too. With enough lighting, you’ll notice the difference between this mirror and other cheap ones you’ve had before.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Al-Muqbel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is exactly what I was looking for to replace an old mirror in a bathroom we just remodeled. I wanted something simple and frameless that laid flat on the wall, but that also looked beautiful. This mirror fit the bill. It is thick glass, well-crafted and we had no problems installing it. We checked out places like Home Depot, sure I could have purchased a mirror there for less, but they were not near the quality this mirror is. My experience is, spend a little more, get a better product. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ofgoodcheer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware

customer_reviews.title: Good product, needs hanger improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror but the system for hanging it needs to be addressed. The little loop hangers are great for pictures but a glass mirror being used over a vanity sink needs to be more secure. There are great (and inexpensive) two piece metal interlocking hangers that would be much more appropriate for something this heavy and made out of glass. The interlocking hangers would also make installation much easier.
